The staff snaps forward, forcing a way through bodies and fear alike.
You sharply yank your staff like a fishing rod, pulling your prey close.
A light catch that turns distance into a fatal closeness.
One subtle hook, and the enemy is reeled in.
The staff snatches fabric and forcefully invites foe.
The staff curls, dragging the enemy close.
Channeling your qi into the ground, you summon those who were as despised as you.

Hidden places empty as the swarm answers its master.
